column4: Problem: As I type anything in ubuntu, anywhere, windows start opening and closing at random, text is copied and pasted at random, things are highlighted at random, and typing this sentence has taken me longer than a few paragraphs normally would take.
I'm using Feisty Fawn on a MacbookPro.
Could be that one of your modifier keys (Ctrl or whatever) is stuck, so you're accidentally pressing key combinations you didn't intend to press
Tap all your Shift/Ctrl/Command/etc. keys once each -- usually that'll unstick a stuck key
